name: Pirate Plunderers
description:
Play as a lowly forgotten pirate trying to make it in the plundering world, defeat encampments on the shore & pirates in the sea to earn loot.

 buy upgrades, and improve your ship to become the king of the 7 seas.

defeat bosses to traverse to new areas and truly become a master of the seas.

Note:

Game is designed to be played on a android tablet but there is a PC version but is not as playable.

This game was made for a year 1 group project at the University of Northampton
